name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building distributed systems and leading engineering teams.
I spend my days architecting backend systems in Go and TypeScript, and my nights building AI tools that actually solve problems.
Founded aiocean.io—a side project exploring how AI agents can enhance developer workflows through MCP (Model Context Protocol) integrations.
Co-founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016, helping grow the Vietnamese frontend ecosystem from the ground up.
I write about engineering, product thinking, and the 1% improvements that compound at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus.
My philosophy: ship early, iterate fast, and let real users guide the next version. Most of my 1.8K GitHub stars came from scratching my own itches and sharing the solutions.

projects.title: jira-mcp
projects.description: Go MCP connector for Jira integration

projects.description: Enrich frontend context for better AI response
